description: LMC files are only used internally to store the configuration for Mobility Client. To export the configuration, click a connection in the "Connections" window in Mobility Client and select Tools → Export Configuration , and choose the type of configuration. Mobility Client creates the LMC file to save the configuration. To import an LMC file, click a connection in the "Connections" window in Mobility Client and select Tools → Import Configuration , and browse for the LMC file.

IBM Mobile Connect allows users to securely access enterprise data and applications from anywhere. Mobility Client is a component of IBM Mobile Connect that is used to create VPN connections across wireless and wireline networks.
